mapper.select: select p.RPLY_ID,p.RPLY_CTT,p.REG_DTM,p.POI_ID,count(c.RPLY_ID) as REPLY_COUNT from RPLY_HSTR as p left join RPLY_HSTR as c on p.RPLY_ID = c.UPPR_RPLY_ID where p.POI_ID = #{poiId} and p.UPPR_RPLY_ID = 0 group by p.RPLY_ID order by p.REG_DTM desc limit 5

select p.RPLY_ID,p.RPLY_CTT,p.REG_DTM,p.CONT_TYPE_ID,count(c.RPLY_ID) as REPLY_COUNT from RPLY_HSTR as p left join RPLY_HSTR as c on p.RPLY_ID = c.UPPR_RPLY_ID where p.CONT_TYPE_ID = #{contTypeId} and p.UPPR_RPLY_ID = 0 group by p.RPLY_ID order by p.REG_DTM desc limit 5

SELECT p.RPLY_CTT, p.REG_DTM FROM RPLY_HSTR AS p LEFT JOIN RPLY_HSTR AS c ON p.UPPR_RPLY_ID = c.RPLY_ID WHERE (p.POI_ID = #{poiId} OR p.CONT_TYPE_ID = #{contTypeId}) AND p.UPPR_RPLY_ID = #{upprRplyId} ORDER BY p.REG_DTM DESC
